title: Part c. [0–6]
stimulusHtml:
6 points (i. 3 points; ii. 3 points)

i. 3 points

1 point: For stating that the orbit is an ellipse

2 points: For diagram with orbit drawn completely outside the circle with point of contact only at point P and major axis along PJ.

Partial credit of 1 point awarded for any path or orbit completely outside the circle.

No points were awarded in any part of path or orbit was inside the circle.

ii. 3 points

1 point: For stating that the orbit is an ellipse

2 points: For diagram with orbit drawn completely inside the circle with point of contact only at point P and major axis along PJ.

Partial credit of 1 point awarded for any path or orbit completely inside the circle.

No points were awarded if any part of path or orbit was outside the circle.

Note: Three points may also be awarded in this part for a path in which the satellite "crashes" into Jupiter only if there is specific reference to the scale of the orbit from part b. and the given radius of Jupiter.
